lead_paragraph: YESSELMAN--Robert. Bob spent 36 years in dance management. He was the executive director of the Paul Taylor Dance Company and the Joffrey Ballet and founding director of Dance/NYC. He was the President of the 1987 "Dancing for Life" gala which was the first dance world response to the AIDS crisis. He passed away in Palm Springs, CA and is survived by his brother and family and by the loving memory of his eternal partner Lee Bruner. 1/3
